'''Pumpkin pie''' is a [[food]] item that can be eaten by the [[player]].

=== Trading ===
{{Trade sources}}

=== Villager gifts ===
{{in|java}}, farmer villagers throw pumpkin pies at players under the [[Hero of the Village]] effect.

== Usage ==

=== Food ===

{{see also|Tutorial: Hunger management|title=Hunger management}}

To eat pumpkin pie, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Eating one restores {{hunger|8}} [[hunger]] and 4.8 [[Hunger#Mechanics|saturation]].

=== Composting ===
Placing pumpkin pie into a [[composter]] raises the compost level by 1.
